reviews.review:
Warum ich mehr als 300 Stunden in dem Spiel habe aber es trotzdem NICHT weiterempfehle?
Das spiel ist noch in der Beta! Es sind SOVIELE!!! Bugs. Die Lobbybugs sind die schlimmsten. Kauft euch das spiel wenn es mal bugfrei ist, momentan ist es einfach nur nervig. Ingame macht es spa√ü, wenn nicht grad ein Killer die ganze zeit Campt oder Bugs ausnutzt. 

Wie gesagt, zuviele Bugs daf√ºr dass das Spiel 'fertig' ist.

Dead by Daylight es un juego que compr√© con cierta ilusi√≥n, lo admito. Los gameplays que vi me intrigaron, y en las rebajas de verano, me anim√©. Y lo cierto es que no me arrepiento, lo contrario, es uno de los mejores juegos en cuanto a tiempo-de-juego/precio que tengo. 

La mec√°nica engancha, y, pese a que a√∫n queda alg√∫n raro glitch, es jugable el 90% del tiempo. Su concepto de 4 vs 1 es genial, haciendo cada partida √∫nica y diferente del resto, pues tanto el asesino como los supervivientes deben jugar respondiendo a lo que hace el resto. Esto da para una infinidad de combinaciones: Desde el "hook camper" que pierde porque le han reparado todos los motores, al "gen rusher" que acaba matando solamente a 1, pero ganando una barbaridad de puntos. 

Los gr√°ficos, aunque con una optimizaci√≥n mejorable, son bastante buenos, siendo la oscuridad y la niebla permanentes un obst√°culo si jugais como asesinos, o un aliado si sois supervivientes. O no.

La m√∫sica, simple pero acertada. Te da el chute de adrenalina en el momento preciso de la manera precisa. 

En general, recomiendo al 100% este juego. Pasar√©is un muy buen rato cada vez que lo inicieis, porque la tensi√≥n y el, por qu√© no decirlo, temor al jugar como superviviente, y la sonrisa s√°dica que se nos pone a los asesinos valen la pena. 

P.D: Alguna vez os encontrar√©is con una situaci√≥n que os puede parecer injusta. Usadla para aprender qu√© hab√©is hecho mal. 

9/10

Do you like Teamwork? Do you like working together by repairing generators and not escaping unless you have all your teammates? Do you believe friendship is magic? 

Then this game is not for you.. However

Do you like to repair generators mostly alone? Do you like to run when others lure the killer to you? Do you also like team mates who leave you for dead as they escape into the night? Do you believe in only your self?

Then this is the game for you.

Gotta say, I haven't played it nearly long as others have, being late to the party, but i have been watching it being played for a while by streamers, and once i got the game itself, I fell in love. Truly an amazing game, 9/11 needs a tab feature to check your bloodpoints.

There is one big Problem in this game. Camping. If the murder camps you can't play this game. 

This game is a really nice game, nice gameplay and a lot of fun, but camping is game-breaking...

Great concept of game and pretty enjoyable when it comes to gameplay. However, Match making and the ping problems needs to be sorted out. As this game is global and an open source server and the killer is able to host. We should implement to enter catogerized global servers (E.G. Asia, Europe, Oceania). Also, please please allow us to see our own FPS/ping as it is very difficult to accurately gauge how smooth the performance of the game is. Tremendous of improvements needed to be done on the online matchmaking. Overall this game is about 5/10.

Its a Buggy but fun mess

Pros:
a game that has no competition in its class
tense to play as a survivor
awesome to play as killer

Lows:
No In game resolution setting
No in game mouse setting
Survivors have less ways to make points (gets better with Perks)

All in all i recommend this game but be aware it feels unfinished and sloppy

This game has a good concept but it has a lot of bugs..there are too many and they are not doing something about this :(

This is a great game with a lot of iconic movie killers in it such as Micheal Myers, Freddy Krueger and Ghostface from the Scream movies, overall this game provides many hours of fun and continues to get more iconic killers and original ones. And with this comes a bunch of new survivors to play as with different perks to suit peoples different playstyles to keep the game fresh for players old and new.
El juego tiene muchos bugs, quedarse atascado y no poder hacer nada como jugar una partida ganarla y ni contarla. Siendo un juego de pago estos errores tendrian que estar solucionados

This game is fantastic!!
Only encountered 1 bug in all my time playing and it was a glitched survivor that was unable to be hit (luckly was resolved when they hit a trap, it brought them back into the field).

The main thing i cannot stress enough about this game is that THE GAME IS TAILORED TOWARDS THE KILLERS HAVING THE UPPER HAND. Let me set the Premise for y'all (since most of the recent reviews are ill informed)

In the realm of the Entity, a mysterious, evil being has captured the minds of 4 (now 5) hapless survivors in a never-ending game of cat and mouse with a deranged killer. The killer is tasked with sacrificing the victims to the entity so it can feast (or so it looks to), only to force the survivors to relive the horror of death, over and over again.

TL:DR; The Entity (spider thing) warps reality and sends one of 4 sadistic killers to harvest your soul over and over. Good luck

The entire basis of this game, when playing as the survivor, is to escape the killer. The survivors cannot fight back, only delay the innevitable...Death. The progression system allows for players to choose how they want to play each survivor, whether they want to help out others, or be a thorn in the killer's side until their dying breath. What good is a horror survival game if surviving is easy? There's no challenege, no survival aspect if you can just jump through the same window over and over again. Each killer has certain strengths and weaknesses which you must learn to adapt to in order to survive, the more experienced killers can take perks from other killers to became the ultimate hunter.

So with that being said, were the nerfs to survivor perks necessary? Some yes, others no. This is to keep the variety of perks healthy. If everyone did the exact same survivor perk build, as soon as the killers found the best way to counter those perks guess what, survivors have ZERO chance at winning. Likewise for killers. If every killer has the same build, or the same character. Simply equip for the most popular and boom! easy wins

TL:DR #2:
- Game favours killers. Get over it, that's the point.
- Survival shouldn't be easy
- Infinite juking was cancer and needed to be fixed (thank you starbreeze)
- Build to suit FoTM
- gitgud.jpg

Why i disliked this game because of the lags and bugs, and the op-ness of the killer. 
-Lags: Every possible game i play is with lag because the killer is the host. I don't understand why they don't make a dedicated server where everyone is happy.

By the way, can the developers create in-game chat where the survivors can communicate? Its hard to play without communications, its like you are playing with a bunch of keyboardless players.

Ich spiele dieses Spiel nun schon knapp 150 Std. und ich muss sagen das es mir immer noch eine Menge Spass macht, ein Spiel das mich seit langem mal wieder intensiv reizt. Ich verstehe deshalb auch nicht die Menge an negativer Bewertung und frage mich wirklich, was ist da denn los? 

Klar kann ich einige verstehen, die dann genervt waren das man keine Spiele gefunden hat, dennoch haben die Entwickler ein paar Stunden sp√§ter f√ºr einen Patch gesorgt und komischerweise ging es dann auch wieder, deswegen bringt mich das nicht dazu ein Spiel negativ zu bewerten. Die Entwickler dieses Spiel arbeiten stetig an Verbesserungen, was nicht immer der Fall in anderen Games ist! Daf√ºr ein dickes Lob. 

Ich kann das Spiel sehr empfehlen und wer mit seinen Freunden in eine Lobby joint wird jede menge Spass haben, aber auch alleine macht es sehr viel Spass!

Klar gibt es unterschiedliche Killer mit denen man erstmal als √úberlebender klar kommen muss, aber wenn man dies mal geschafft hat, dann hat man auch leichtes Spiel, deshalb auch mein Tip nun so am Rande, konzentriert euch vielleicht erstmal nur auf einen √úberlebenden, levelt ihn, r√ºstet die richtigen Perks aus und habt Spass, das gleiche gilt nat√ºrlich auch f√ºr den Killer. Macht nicht alle aufeinmal ;)!

So zum Abschluss noch was mir so gut daran gef√§llt, nun ja es war von Anfang an etwas neues, ein neues Spielprinzip, etwas gruselig, wenn man eh ein kleiner Schisshase ist. Die Abwechslung gef√§llt mir daran, denn du wei√üt nie was es f√ºr ein Killer ist, wenn du einer Lobby joinst. Die Grafik finde ich auch f√ºr dieses Spiel passend.

Was mir nicht gef√§llt, also oft nicht gef√§llt, das viele einfach das Spiel verlassen.....:(
Me encanta este juego. Solamente le falta mas gente que lo juegue y un canvio en la mecanica de quien es el host

**On a serious note the games many bugs are starting to become very annoying, I still want to play the game but it's just very enraging 80% of the time**

>running from killer
>sees throw down
>attempts to vault over throw down

>game once again decides to put me in cupboard
>gets killed
>gets angry
